channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Veteran skier found buried in avalanche on desolate trail by wife using transceiver
Capital One customers report deposits not showing up in their accounts
item.description: Capital One says the bank is working to restore service after thousands of customers reported problems depositing money.

item.title: Satellite photos show the Gaza Strip before and after the devastation of the Israel-Hamas war
LA wildfire victims: What we know about those killed
item.description: Family members have begun to identify the residents who were killed in the devastating wildfires in the Los Angeles area.

item.title: As wildfires linger, focus turns to rebuilding Los Angeles’ leveled neighborhoods
4-year-old girl found safe after vehicle stolen with her in back seat: Police
item.description: Four-year-old Blessing Aoci was in the back seat of a vehicle when it was stolen early Thursday morning in Rock Island, Illinois, police said.

item.title: Justin Baldoni sues Blake Lively as "It Ends With Us" feud deepens
item.description: Justin Baldoni's lawsuit comes after "It Ends With Us" co-star Blake Lively accused him of sexual harassment.

item.title: Giuliani settles with Georgia election workers over defamation payout
9 of the 10 Largest Companies in the World Are Making Big Moves Into AI. Here's Why Investors Should Pay Attention.
Supreme Court may announce opinions Friday as TikTok decision looms
item.description: The Supreme Court said it may announce opinions on Friday, a last-minute addition that comes just two days before a law that would ban TikTok is set t...

item.title: Investors urge Walmart not to "give into bullying" on diversity
item.description: Some Walmart shareholders say the retailer hasn't offered a good business case for canceling its diversity, equity and inclusion programs.

item.title: Altadena family recounts their harrowing escape from Eaton Fire
item.description: The Taylor family reflects on their evacuation from the Eaton Fire and discusses the loss of their home in Altadena.

item.title: Southwest Officially Launching Connections to Europe — What to Know
As Biden warns of an ‘oligarchy,’ Trump will be flanked by tech billionaires at his inauguration
item.description: The super-rich have long played a role in U.S. politics but have an unusually prominent spot in incoming President Donald Trump’s new administration.

item.title: Is a short-term CD worth it for 2025?
item.description: For some savers, a short-term CD account could still be worth opening now. Here's why.

item.title: Allegedly intoxicated Southwest Airlines pilot arrested at airport ahead of flight
item.description: Southwest Airlines confirmed the pilot had been removed from duty and apologized to customers whose travel plans were disrupted.

item.title: From LA wildfires to hurricanes, immigrants help rebuild after disasters. Some may face deportation
Woman wins jackpot from lotto ticket she 'stole' in Christmas gift exchange
item.description: Emily Hickox, an Indiana woman, won $500,000 after playing a Michigan Lottery instant game ticket.
